Name: Battle Imagine - Tatta
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Tatta's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Heart of Flame.

Arcane! Heart of Flame
Summon Tatta to grant Battle Will to the entire team, preventing all allies from being defeated and ensuring their HP does not fall below a certain threshold for a period of time.
(Cannot be affected by the same type of effect within 100s)

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
